<<<<<<< HEAD
A iust apologie for the gesture of kneeling in the act of receiving the Lords Supper Against the manifold exceptions of all opposers in the Churches of England, and Scotland. Wherein this controversie is handled, fully. Soundly. Plainly. Methodically. By T.P. Paybody, Thomas, b. 1597 or 8.
[12], 496 p.
Printed by William Iones, dwelling in Red-crosse-streets, London : 1629.
Dedication signed: Thomas Paybody. The words "fully. .. Methodically." are enclosed in brackets on the title page. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======

[12], 496 p.
Printed by William Iones, dwelling in Red-crosse-streets, London : 1629.
Dedication signed: Thomas Paybody. The words "fully. .. Methodically." are enclosed in brackets on the title page. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
